It's a "Gorillas in the Mist" kind of day as we bring "Falling Blossom" back this year, ready in time for the summer. This amazing Orange IPA has a wonderful citrus aroma and flavour, making it very drinkable at 4.2% ABV. We have already sold out of all of the cask, but don't worry we will have it on the pumps at The Hop Chapel, Three Crowns and Hop Gardens this Summer. üçä üçä üçä

We did it again. Broadtown Brewery were presented by Swindon and North Wilts CAMRA today with the "Beer of the Festival", and "Overall Winner of The Festival" awards. Since the shield was created a decade ago in honour of Dave Backhouse, one of the founding members and Chairman member of the Swindon and North Wilts CAMRA group, we are the only brewery to have won the award twice and two years in a row.. This is the third Festival "Overall Winning Beer off the Festival" win that we have been awarded by CAMRA since we started entering three years ago, and we thank you all for the support you have given since our start up in 2018.
